item.title: Nidia add a quote by Will Smith
item.description: "The keys to life are running and reading. When you're running, there's a little person that talks to you and says, "Oh I'm tired. My lung's about to pop. I'm so hurt. There's no way I can possibly continue." You want to quit. If you learn how to defeat that person when you're running. You will how to not quit when things get hard in your life. For reading: there have been gazillions of people that have lived before all of us. There's no new problem you could have--with your parents, with school, with a bully. There's no new problem that someone hasn't already had and written about it in a book." -- Will Smith

item.title: Nidia add a quote by Paulo Coelho
item.description: "And, when you want something, all the universe conspires in helping you to achieve it." -- Paulo Coelho

item.title: Nidia add a quote by Paulo Coelho
item.description: "There is only one thing that makes a dream impossible to achieve: the fear of failure." -- Paulo Coelho

item.title: Nidia add a quote by Elizabeth Gilbert
item.description: "God dwells within you, as you." -- Elizabeth Gilbert

item.title: Nidia add a quote by Elizabeth Gilbert
item.description: "There’s a crack (or cracks) in everyone…that’s how the light of God gets in." -- Elizabeth Gilbert

item.title: Nidia add a quote by Will Smith
item.description: "The only thing that I see that is distinctly different about me is I'm not afraid to die on a treadmill. I will not be out-worked, period. You might have more talent than me, you might be smarter than me, you might be sexier than me, you might be all of those things you got it on me in nine categories. But if we get on the treadmill together, there's two things: You're getting off first, or I'm going to die. It's really that simple, right? You're not going to out-work me. It's such a simple, basic concept. The guy who is willing to hustle the most is going to be the guy that just gets that loose ball. The majority of people who aren't getting the places they want or aren't achieving the things that they want in this business is strictly based on hustle. It's strictly based on being out-worked; it's strictly based on missing crucial opportunities. I say all the time if you stay ready, you ain't gotta get ready." -- Will Smith

item.title: Nidia add a quote by Paulo Coelho
item.description: "The secret of life, though, is to fall seven times and to get up eight times." -- Paulo Coelho

item.title: Nidia add a quote by Paulo Coelho
item.description: "Remember that wherever your heart is, there you will find your treasure." -- Paulo Coelho

item.title: Nidia add a quote by Charlaine Harris
item.description: "Here’s to books, the cheapest vacation you can buy." -- Charlaine Harris

item.title: Nidia add a quote by Elizabeth Gilbert
item.description: "I am a better person when I have less on my plate." -- Elizabeth Gilbert

item.title: Nidia add a quote by Elizabeth Gilbert
item.description: "I want God to play in my bloodstream the way sunlight amuses itself on the water." -- Elizabeth Gilbert

item.title: Nidia add a quote by Elizabeth Gilbert
item.description: "Stop wearing your wishbone where your backbone ought to be." -- Elizabeth Gilbert

item.title: Nidia add a quote by Elizabeth Gilbert
item.description: "I met an old lady once, almost a hundred years old, and she told me, 'There are only two questions that human beings have ever fought over, all through history. How much do you love me? And Who's in charge?" -- Elizabeth Gilbert

item.title: Nidia add a quote by Paulo Coelho
item.description: "It's the possibility of having a dream come true that makes life interesting." -- Paulo Coelho

item.title: Nidia add a quote by Paulo Coelho
item.description: "Everyone seems to have a clear idea of how other people should lead their lives, but none about his or her own." -- Paulo Coelho

item.title: Nidia add a quote by Paulo Coelho
item.description: "Cuando una persona desea realmente algo, el universo entero conspira para que pueda ralizar su sueño." -- Paulo Coelho

item.title: Nidia add a quote by Paulo Coelho
item.description: "What's the world's greatest lie?... It's this: that at a certain point in our lives, we lose control of what's happening to us, and our lives become controlled by fate." -- Paulo Coelho

item.title: Nidia add a quote by Paulo Coelho
item.description: "Anyone who is in love is making love the whole time, even when they're not. When two bodies meet, it is just the cup overflowing. They can stay together for hours, even days. They begin the dance one day and finish it the next, or--such is the pleasure they experience--they may never finish it. No eleven minutes for them." -- Paulo Coelho

item.title: Nidia add a quote by Steig Larson
item.description: "I’ve had many enemies over the years. If there’s one thing I’ve learned, it’s never engage in a fight you’re sure to lose. On the other hand, never let anyone who has insulted you get away with it. Bide your time and strike back when you’re in a position of strength—even if you no longer need to strike back." -- Steig Larson

item.title: Nidia add a quote by Will Smith
item.description: "Too many people spend money they haven't earned, to buy things they don't want, to impress people they don't like" -- Will Smith

item.title: Nidia add a quote by Will Smith
item.description: "Being realistic is the most common path to mediocrity." -- Will Smith
